name: VentureMind
overview:
VentureMind is a strategic consulting firm that follows a systematic approach to identifying innovative technologies and companies in the Silicon Valley and Israel.

Our clients are global enterprises and private equity firms that seek open innovation and strategic investment opportunities.

VentureMind partners with universities, incubators, accelerators, angel investors and venture capital firms to review hundreds of companies each year, and identify disruptive business models and rapid growth trends as early as possible.

We maintain a close relationship with the leading companies in each category, and provide our clients with regular reports on their progress.

VentureMind’s core areas of expertise include Mobile, Local, Social, Payment, Education and Enterprise and Telecom IT technologies.
